page.title: 02Mr. Honeybun's Farm (Cont.)
page.content: Mr Honeybun uses about 50 tonnes of chemical{fertilizers}a year on his grassland. He has a lot of machinery including four tractors, a digger, silage trailers and a variety of some 20 other pieces of{machinery. Mr Honeybun has been farming here for about 20 years,he says he wouldn't like to stop{farming}and he couldn't really even if he wanted to,because his money is all tied up with the farm. He likes some work on the farm and dislikes other work but on the whole he likes his job and gets {satisfaction}out of it.
